Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: AccessKey
properties.description: Optional. The access key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.

type.description: Optional. The access key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.

properties.name: AgentArns
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the agents associated with the self-managed object storage server location.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the agents associated with the self-managed object storage server location.

properties.name: BucketName
properties.description: The name of the bucket on the self-managed object storage server.

type.description: The name of the bucket on the self-managed object storage server.

properties.name: SecretKey
properties.description: Optional. The secret key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.

type.description: Optional. The secret key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.

properties.name: ServerCertificate
properties.description: X.509 PEM content containing a certificate authority or chain to trust.

type.description: X.509 PEM content containing a certificate authority or chain to trust.

properties.name: ServerHostname
properties.description: The name of the self-managed object storage server. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the object storage server.

type.description: The name of the self-managed object storage server. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the object storage server.

properties.name: ServerPort
properties.description: The port that your self-managed server accepts inbound network traffic on.

type.description: The port that your self-managed server accepts inbound network traffic on.

properties.name: ServerProtocol
properties.description: The protocol that the object storage server uses to communicate.

type.description: The protocol that the object storage server uses to communicate.

properties.name: Subdirectory
properties.description: The subdirectory in the self-managed object storage server that is used to read data from.

type.description: The subdirectory in the self-managed object storage server that is used to read data from.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: LocationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the location that is created.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the location that is created.

properties.name: LocationUri
properties.description: The URL of the object storage location that was described.

type.description: The URL of the object storage location that was described.
